chart_metadata.description: Jenkins is a leading open source automation server,

attrs.label: Additional Jenkins Java Options
attrs.description:

attrs.label: CPU
attrs.description: CPU limit for Jenkins.

schema.valid_chars_error:
Valid CPU limit formats are</br>
- Plain Integer - eg. 1</br>
- Float - eg. 0.5</br>
- Milicpu - eg. 500m

attrs.label: Memory
attrs.description: Memory limit for Jenkins.

schema.valid_chars_error:
Valid Memory limit formats are</br>
- Suffixed with E/P/T/G/M/K - eg. 1G</br>
- Suffixed with Ei/Pi/Ti/Gi/Mi/Ki - eg. 1Gi</br>
- Plain Integer in bytes - eg. 1024</br>
- Exponent - eg. 134e6

1.2.4.app_readme:
Jenkins

Jenkins. The leading open source automation server, Jenkins provides hundreds of plugins to support building, deploying and automating any project.

When application is installed and on each startup, a container will be launched with root privileges. This is required in order to apply the correct permissions to the Jenkins directories. Afterward, the Jenkins container will run as a non-root user (1000). All mounted storage(s) will be chowned only if the parent directory does not match the user and group (1000).
1.2.4.detailed_readme:
Jenkins

Jenkins. The leading open source automation server, Jenkins provides hundreds of plugins to support building, deploying and automating any project.

When application is installed and on each startup, a container will be launched with root privileges. This is required in order to apply the correct permissions to the Jenkins directories. Afterward, the Jenkins container will run as a non-root user (1000). All mounted storage(s) will be chowned only if the parent directory does not match the user and group (1000).
